mapper.select:
SELECT C.COMPLAINT_NO ,MEMBER_NO ,TITLE ,ENROLL_DATE ,STATUS ,IMG_NO ,IMG_NAME ,PATH FROM COMPLAINT C JOIN (SELECT I.*,ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY I.COMPLAINT_NO ORDER BY I.IMG_NO) AS RN FROM COMPLAINT_IMG I) I ON C.COMPLAINT_NO = I.COMPLAINT_NO AND I.RN = 1 WHERE DEL_YN = 'N'
AND C.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} ORDER BY COMPLAINT_NO DESC, I.IMG_NO

insert.foreach: INTO COMPLAINT_IMG ( IMG_NO ,COMPLAINT_NO ,IMG_NAME ,PATH ,ORIGIN_NAME ) VALUES ( (SELECT GET_COMPLAINT_IMG_SEQ() FROM DUAL ) ,SEQ_COMPLAINT_NO.CURRVAL ,#{item.imgName} ,#{item.path} ,#{item.originName} )

mapper.select: SELECT C.COMPLAINT_NO ,MEMBER_NO ,TITLE ,CONTENT ,ENROLL_DATE ,STATUS ,REPLY ,REPLY_DATE ,IMG_NO ,IMG_NAME ,PATH FROM COMPLAINT C LEFT JOIN COMPLAINT_IMG I ON C.COMPLAINT_NO = I.COMPLAINT_NO WHERE DEL_YN = 'N' AND C.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND C.COMPLAINT_NO = #{complaintNo}

SELECT C.COMPLAINT_NO ,C.MANAGER_NO ,M.MEMBER_NO ,M.NAME ,DONG ,HO ,TITLE ,CONTENT ,ENROLL_DATE ,C.DEL_YN ,STATUS ,REPLY ,REPLY_DATE ,IMG_NO ,IMG_NAME ,PATH ,ORIGIN_NAME FROM COMPLAINT C JOIN MEMBER M ON M.MEMBER_NO = C.MEMBER_NO JOIN UNIT U ON M.UNIT_NO = U.UNIT_NO JOIN (SELECT I.*,ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY I.COMPLAINT_NO ORDER BY I.IMG_NO) AS RN FROM COMPLAINT_IMG I) IMG ON C.COMPLAINT_NO = IMG.COMPLAINT_NO AND IMG.RN = 1 ORDER BY COMPLAINT_NO DESC, IMG.IMG_NO

SELECT C.COMPLAINT_NO ,C.MANAGER_NO ,M.MEMBER_NO ,M.NAME ,DONG ,HO ,TITLE ,CONTENT ,ENROLL_DATE ,C.DEL_YN ,STATUS ,REPLY ,REPLY_DATE ,IMG_NO ,IMG_NAME ,PATH ,ORIGIN_NAME FROM COMPLAINT C JOIN MEMBER M ON M.MEMBER_NO = C.MEMBER_NO JOIN UNIT U ON M.UNIT_NO = U.UNIT_NO JOIN COMPLAINT_IMG I ON C.COMPLAINT_NO = I.COMPLAINT_NO WHERE C.COMPLAINT_NO = #{complaintNo}

SELECT C.COMPLAINT_NO ,MANAGER_NO ,MEMBER_NO ,TITLE ,CONTENT ,ENROLL_DATE ,DEL_YN ,STATUS ,REPLY ,REPLY_DATE ,IMG_NO ,IMG_NAME ,PATH ,ORIGIN_NAME FROM COMPLAINT C JOIN COMPLAINT_IMG I ON C.COMPLAINT_NO = I.COMPLAINT_NO WHERE TITLE LIKE '%${title}%'
AND CONTENT LIKE '%${content}%'
AND DEL_YN = #{delYn}
AND REPLY IS NULL
AND REPLY LIKE '%${reply}%'
AND STATUS = #{status}
AND (ENROLL_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{enrollDateStart}) AND TO_DATE(#{enrollDateEnd}))
AND (REPLY_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{replyDateStart}) AND TO_DATE(#{replyDateEnd}))
ORDER BY C.COMPLAINT_NO DESC
